strapiJob.title: Marketing Manager
strapiJob.description:
You’ll collaborate closely with the product and design teams to enable SupplyPike’s operations, sales, and customer success efforts. You will lead the team that develops SupplyPike’s branding across multiple teams that will inspire, engage and excite potential customers. 

Key Responsibilities

  • Leads and mentors a cross-functional team of 3-5 people 
  • Conducts team meetings, such as one-on-ones, project updates, and brainstorming
  • Communicates project progress and metrics to internal stakeholders
  • Works diligently to hit the teams goals and ensures employees are routinely hitting their individual metrics
  • Brainstorms how the team can ever improve to exceed goals, improve current processes, and deliver the 11-star customer experience
  • Researches benchmarks and best practices and relays that information to the team

Skills Knowledge and Expertise

  • Bachelor’s Degree from an accredited college or university
  • 3-5 years of project management experience
  • 1-2 years of leadership experience
  • Experience with Project Management tools, such as ClickUp, Jira, Monday.com, or Asana
  • Experience with collecting project requirements from cross-functional teams
  • Eager to grow and improve- Receptive to critique, feedback, and open communication
  • Excellent time management skills and ability to multitask and prioritize work
  • Must be motivated and able to work with minimal supervision
  • Exceptional verbal and written communication skills

Culture Code

SupplyPike Culture (more here)

SupplyPike is Great Place To Work™ certified and is recognized as Arkansas’ Best Places To Work. We pride ourselves on creating an open, transparent, and collaborative work environment. The SupplyPike company pillars are:

  • Intellectual Curiosity: We advocate for our employees to explore new concepts, enhance their knowledge, and better themselves.
  • Collaboration: We encourage cross-team collaboration and interdisciplinary skills.
  • Lean & Agile: We embrace the concept of fast iterative development.
  • Intellectual Integrity: Our work culture is all about ownership and agency where we can reflect upon mistakes and learn from them.
  • Empathy: We strive for a welcoming and considerate environment where we take a “no blame” approach.
  • Play: We set aside time for social clubs, events, team outings, and lunches.

About SupplyPike

SupplyPike is on a mission to change the lives of suppliers by giving them amazing tools to change the way they work. But that won’t happen without awesome people like you joining our team!

Founded in Fayetteville, Ark. in 2018, SupplyPike is a diverse group of smart, caring, and driven people that want to make a dent in the world. We strive to treat each other as human beings, and that means creating an inclusive environment where everyone can be themselves and freely contribute ideas, express dissent, and share experiences that will help us grow as people and as a company.

About Fayetteville, Arkansas

Beautiful Fayetteville, nestled in the lush Ozark Mountains, consistently ranks in the Top 5 U.S. News best places to live in the U.S (2021, 2020, 2019) for its quality of life and cost of living and the Top 10 in job growth (Forbes). In addition to being the home to two Fortune 100 and three Fortune 500 companies, Fayetteville also has a strong entrepreneurial community with a growing number of startup companies.
